src:
Zaev sa Kurtijem razgovarao o jačanju odnosa Severne Makedonije i Kosova

04 Nov 2019, 17:40















Premijer Severne Makedonije Zoran Zaev primio je danas lidera "Samoopredeljenja" sa Kosova Albina Kurtija, sa kojim je razgovarao o budućoj saradnji i jačanju bilateralnih odnosa dve zemlje, saopštila je vlada u Skoplju.Kako se navodi, na sastanku premijera Zaeva i lidera "Samoopredeljenja" Kurtija "potvrdjeni su izuzetno dobri odnosi dve zemlje" i  naglašeno da su njihovo održavanje i nove incijative za saradnju od  izuzetnog značaja i za Zapadni Balkan i za svaku zemlju u regionu pojedinačno, iz ugla zajedničkih aspiracija za članstvo u EU".U razgovoru su kao prioriteti izdvojeni projekti infrastrukturnog povezivanja, medju kojima se, osim autoputa Skoplje – Blace, izdvajaju putna povezivanja Tetova i Prizrena, kao i dodatno formiranje kapaciteta na grančnom prelazu "Jažince", koji će,ističe se, u velikoj meri olakšati komunikaciju gradjana i biznis zajednice zapadnog dela Severne Makedonije i jugozapadnog regiona Kosova.Sastanku premijera Zorana Zaeva i i lidera "Samopredeljenja" Albina Kurtija u Vladi Severne Makedonije prisustvovali su poslanik njegove stranke SDSM Muhamed Zećiri i novoizabrani poslanici u kosovskom parlamentu Fitore Pacoli i Liburn Aliu.
text:
Zaev discussed with Kurti the strengthening of relations between Northern Macedonia and Kosovo

04 Nov 2019, 16:40















Northern Macedonia's Prime Minister Zoran Zaev received today's Kosovo Self-Determination Leader Albin Kurti, discussing future co-operation and strengthening bilateral relations between the two countries, the government announced in Skopje.According to a meeting between Prime Minister Zaev and the leader of "Self-determination" Kurti "confirmed the excellent relations between the two countries" and stressed that their maintenance and new cooperation initiatives are of great importance for both the Western Balkans and each country in the region individually, from the perspective of common aspirations for EU membership. " Priorities are allocated to the projects of infrastructural connection, among which apart from the Skopje-Blace highway, the road connections between Tetovo and Prizren are highlighted, as well as additional capacity building at the Jažince border crossing, which, it is pointed out, will greatly facilitate communication between citizens and the business community. Western part of northern Macedonia and southwestern region of Kosovo. Meeting of Prime Minister Zoran Zaev and leaders of "S ampopoints "Albin Kurti in the Government of Northern Macedonia was attended by his SDSM MP Muhammad Zeqiri and newly elected deputies in the Kosovo Parliament Fitore Pacoli and Liburn Ali.
